sagex.phoenix.homecontrol.themostat

Interface IThermostatControl


  • public interface IThermostatControl
    Communicates with NEST and gets nest information

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IDevice getDeviceForId(java.lang.String id)
      Gets the Device for given device id
      java.util.List<IDevice> getDevices()
      Returns the list of devices controlled by this controller.
      IDeviceStatus getDeviceStatus(IDevice device)
      Returns the current device status (temp, humidity, etc)
      java.lang.String getLastMessage()
      Returns the last error message that set since the last update.
      long getLastUpdated()
      Returns the date/time of the last sucessful update
      void setMode(IDevice device, java.lang.String mode)
      Mode is 'heat', 'cool', 'heatcool' or 'off'
      void setTargetTemp(IDevice device, float temp)
      Sets a new target temperature for a device
